column1: How to create a contact file.
column2: How to create a contact file.

column1: 1. Sign into your Outlook Email account.
column2: 1. Sign into your Outlook Email account.

column1: 2. Click on the People menu at the upper-left corner of your screen.
column2: 2. Click on the People menu at the upper-left corner of your screen.

column1: 3. Click Manage contacts in the menu bar.
column2: 3. Click Manage contacts in the menu bar.

column1: 5. Now you can Export the contacts by clicking on Export button.
column2: 5. Now you can Export the contacts by clicking on Export button.
